creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: figure in fishing boat near center; groove of trees on rocky shore LLQ; tall bluff with foliage URQ; inscription ULQ
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seals, and Stickers

ULQ
markings: marks on top when rolled: [Dainen (sie. Kantenju) Nanga d. 1795]; seals upper center: rectangular relief; ULQ: two square intaglio; LRC: oval intaglio; stickers on roller ends: [Tenju LS/after Fukuyu]
title: Landscape after I Fukyū
